ComicInfo.Title: Million Dollar Smile
ComicInfo.Summary: Million Dollar Smile: Lucian Long leaks J. C. Pratt's name to Squeegee, who attacks Pratt and his girlfriend Ally at Pratt's apartment. As The Crush, Pratt pushes Squeegee off the roof of his apartment building.
ComicInfo.Characters: Ally,Isaac (a squeal),The Crush (J. C. Pratt),Mister Humperdinck,Lucian Long,Zabar,Emma Long, Ed Dexter,Squeegee (Hector Diaz)
ComicInfo.Colorist: Christopher Sotomayor,Digital Chameleon,Jennifer Graves,Christopher Sotomayor,Digital Chameleon,Jennifer Graves
